faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How do I add AlphaLLM to my Discord server?
faq.a1: Click the "Add to Discord" button on our homepage and follow the instructions.
faq.a2: The main commands are /chat for conversation, /image for generating images, and /help to get assistance.
faq.q3: Is the bot free to use?
faq.a3: Yes, AlphaLLM offers a free plan with basic features. Premium plans are available for more features.
faq.q4: How do I change the bot's language?
faq.a4: Use the /settings language command to change the bot's language in your server.

contact.title: Contact Us

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: By using AlphaLLM, you agree to the following terms:
terms.usageText: AlphaLLM is provided "as is" without any warranty of any kind. We reserve the right to modify or discontinue the service at any time.
terms.contentText: You are responsible for the content you share through AlphaLLM. Illegal, offensive or abusive content is prohibited.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.collectText: We collect certain information to improve our services, including messages for model training.
privacy.useText: Collected data is used to improve our service, resolve technical issues and personalize user experience.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.text: Our website uses cookies to enhance your experience. You can configure your browser to refuse cookies.

contact.title: Legal Contact
contact.text: For any legal questions, contact us at: legal@alphallm.tech
